original_title: Cabinet nod for Preferential Trade Agreement with Indonesia
original_body_lines: The Cabinet of Ministers approved the proposal presented by the President, to enter into a preferential trade agreement as a preliminary step to reach a long term free trade agreement with Indonesia.
